languages.text: "Какую бы судьбу вы ни избрали для сего мира... торопитесь, Лорд-капитан! Планета сгорает в бушующих всполохах багрового и пурпурного — я вижу это даже с орбиты. Как и то, что буря... уже совсем близко. С каждой секундой править корабль сквозь завихрения варпа становится все сложнее и опаснее".

"Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."
languages.original_text: "Какую бы судьбу вы ни избрали для сего мира... торопитесь, Лорд-капитан! Планета сгорает в бушующих всполохах багрового и пурпурного — я вижу это даже с орбиты. Как и то, что буря... уже совсем близко. С каждой секундой править корабль сквозь завихрения варпа становится все сложнее и опаснее".

The planet is burning in the raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it becomes ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the the warp's turbulent flows."

As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

"Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

languages.text: "Welches Schicksal Ihr auch für diese Welt beschließt ... Ihr solltet Euch beeilen, Lord Captain! Der Planet brennt in tobenden Blitzen aus Rot und Violett, das sehe ich sogar aus dem Orbit. Genau wie ich sehe, dass der Sturm uns bereits erreicht hat. Mit jedem Moment, den wir zögern, wird es schwieriger und gefährlicher, das Schiff durch die turbulenten Strömungen des Warp zu steuern."
languages.original_text: "Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

traits.locale_text: "Welches Schicksal Ihr auch für diese Welt beschließt ... Ihr solltet Euch beeilen, Lord Captain! Der Planet brennt in tobenden Blitzen aus Rot und Violett, das sehe ich sogar aus dem Orbit. Genau wie ich sehe, dass der Sturm uns bereits erreicht hat. Mit jedem Moment, den wir zögern, wird es schwieriger und gefährlicher, das Schiff durch die turbulenten Strömungen des Warp zu steuern."

languages.text: « Quel que soit le sort que vous choisirez pour ce monde... vous devez faire vite, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La planète est en proie à des éclats furieux de rouge et de violet, je les vois depuis l'orbite... et je vois également la tempête qui nous guette. Plus nous perdons du temps, plus nous aurons du mal à diriger le vaisseau dans les courants agités du Warp et plus nous courrons de risques. »
languages.original_text: "Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

traits.locale_text: « Quel que soit le sort que vous choisirez pour ce monde... vous devez faire vite, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La planète est en proie à des éclats furieux de rouge et de violet, je les vois depuis l'orbite... et je vois également la tempête qui nous guette. Plus nous perdons du temps, plus nous aurons du mal à diriger le vaisseau dans les courants agités du Warp et plus nous courrons de risques. »

languages.text: “虽然不知道你打算如何处置这个世界……但我劝你抓紧时间，舰长大人。这颗行星正在熊熊燃烧，闪烁着深红色和紫色的光芒，哪怕在轨道上也能看得清清楚楚。我看得很清楚，风暴已经来临。我们每浪费一秒钟，驾驶飞船穿越亚空间湍流的旅程，都会变得更加困难，更加危险。”
languages.original_text: "Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

traits.locale_text: “虽然不知道你打算如何处置这个世界……但我劝你抓紧时间，舰长大人。这颗行星正在熊熊燃烧，闪烁着深红色和紫色的光芒，哪怕在轨道上也能看得清清楚楚。我看得很清楚，风暴已经来临。我们每浪费一秒钟，驾驶飞船穿越亚空间湍流的旅程，都会变得更加困难，更加危险。”

languages.text: 「この惑星の運命をどのようにお定めになるにせよ…お急ぎを、ロード・キャプテン！星が真紅と紫の荒れ狂う閃光で燃えているのが、軌道上からでも見えます。既に我々に吹き荒れている嵐も。時間を無駄にするほど、船が<歪み>の乱流を通り抜けるのが難しく、危険になってしまいます」
languages.original_text: "Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星にどのような運命を選ばれるにせよ…お急ぎを、ロード・キャプテン！星が真紅と紫の荒れ狂う閃光で燃えているのが、軌道上からでも見えます。既に我々に吹き荒れている嵐も。時間を無駄にするほど、船が<歪み>の乱流を通り抜けるのが難しく、危険になってしまいます」
「この惑星の運命をどのようにお定めになるにせよ…お急ぎを、ロード・キャプテン！星が真紅と紫の荒れ狂う閃光で燃えているのが、軌道上からでも見えます。既に我々に吹き荒れている嵐も。時間を無駄にするほど、船が<歪み>の乱流を通り抜けるのが難しく、危険になってしまいます」

languages.text: «Sea cual sea el destino que elija para este mundo... ¡le pido que se apresure, Lord Capitán! Veo el planeta ardiendo con destellos carmesí y morado incluso desde la órbita. También detecto que la tormenta nos ha alcanzado. Cada minuto que desperdiciamos, será más difícil y peligroso atravesar las turbulentas corrientes de la disformidad con nuestra nave».
languages.original_text: "Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

traits.locale_text: «Sea cual sea el destino que elija para este mundo... ¡le pido que se apresure, Lord Capitán! Veo el planeta ardiendo con destellos carmesí y morado incluso desde la órbita. También detecto que la tormenta nos ha alcanzado. Cada minuto que desperdiciamos, será más difícil y peligroso atravesar las turbulentas corrientes de la disformidad con nuestra nave».

languages.text: "Bu dünyayı hangi kadere mahkûm edeceksin bilemiyorum ama rica ederim acele et Lord Kaptan! Gezegen, kızıl mor parıltılarla yanıyor. Yörüngeden bile görebiliyorum. Hakeza üzerimize musallat olan fırtınayı da... Boşa harcadığımız her an ile beraber, gemiyi öteboyutun çalkantılı akıntısında yönlendirmek daha da zor ve tehlikeli hâle gelecek."
languages.original_text: "Whatever fate you choose for this world... I urge you to make haste, Lord Captain! The planet is burning in raging flashes of crimson and purple, I can see it even from orbit. As do I see that the storm is already upon us. With every moment that we waste, it grows ever more difficult and perilous to steer the ship through the warp's turbulent currents."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyayı hangi kadere mahkûm edeceksin bilemiyorum ama rica ederim acele et Lord Kaptan! Gezegen, kızıl mor parıltılarla yanıyor. Yörüngeden bile görebiliyorum. Hakeza üzerimize musallat olan fırtınayı da... Boşa harcadığımız her an, gemiyi öteboyutun çalkantılı akıntısında yönlendirmek daha da zor ve tehlikeli hâle geliyor."
